How many people are affected by ethylmalonic encephalopathy ?,"About 30 individuals with this condition have been identified worldwide, mostly in Mediterranean and Arab populations. Although ethylmalonic encephalopathy appears to be very rare, researchers suggest that some cases have been misdiagnosed as other neurologic disorders.",GHR,ethylmalonic encephalopathy
